titles.title: Prison Inmate Tax Fraud Reduction Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the disclosure of certain prisoner return information to prison officials.
Prison Inmate Tax Fraud Reduction Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Prison Inmate Tax Fraud Reduction Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to disclose in writing to the head of the Federal Bureau of Prisons or a state prison, subject to certain restrictions, taxpayer identity information of prisoners and whether such prisoners have claimed or received a federal tax refund that may be based on a false or fraudulent tax return.
